00042 /*
00043  * Constructor.
00044  */
00045 Components::Components() : Details()
00046 {
00047   m_lastRequestedPage = -1;
00048   m_lastReportedCols = -1;
00049   m_lastReportedCols = -1;
00050 
00051   m_fullPage[0] = "";
00052   m_fullPage[1] = "";
00053 
00054   m_fullPageIndex = 0;
00055   m_currentPageBuffer = "";
00056 
00057   m_thisType = detail_components;
00058 
00059   m_time = "00:00:00 UTC";
00060   m_date = "0000-00-00";
00061   m_activity = "None";
00062 
00063   m_screenBuffer.clear();
00064 
00065   m_chanTotalCount = 0;
00066   m_chanRunningCount = 0;
00067   m_dxOfflineCount = 0;
00068   m_dxIdleCount = 0;
00069   m_dxBaseAccumCount = 0;
00070   m_dxDataCollCount = 0;
00071   m_dxSigDetCount = 0;
00072   m_dxTotalCount = 0;
00073 
00074   m_channelizerSummary = "";
00075 
00076   m_minDxFreqMHz = 9999999.0;
00077   m_maxDxFreqMHz = -1;
00078 
00079   m_lastFreqRangeStringLen = 0;
00080 
00081   m_detailsCount = 0;
00082 }
00083 
00084 /*
00085  * Add a line of information about a component to the list.
00086  * The information is filtered to accept only lines that start with
00087  * channelizer, dx, arch, tscope, beam, array, primary, and NSS.
00088  *
00089  * @param line The line of text read in from the
00090  * "sse-system-status.txt" file.
00091  * @return true if an entire record of system statuses have been read
00092  * int. The end of a record is marked in "sse-system-status.txt" by a
00093  * line starting with "=============". Else, false.
00094  */
00095 bool Components::addWithFilter(string line)
00096 {
00097     if(Utils::startsWith("chan", line))
00098     {
00099         size_t pos = line.find("UTC");
00100         if(pos != string::npos)
00101         {
00102             line = line.replace(pos, (size_t)4, "");
00103             pos = line.find("UTC", pos+1);
00104         }
00105 
00106         m_chanTotalCount++;
00107 
00108         pos = line.find("Run");
00109         if(pos != string::npos)
00110         {
00111             m_chanRunningCount++;
00112         }
00113 
00114         add((line));
00115     }
00116     else if(Utils::startsWith("dx", line))
00117     {
00118 
00119         string newLine = line;
00120 
00121         size_t pos = newLine.find("UTC");
00122         if(pos != string::npos && pos < newLine.size() - 5)
00123         {
00124             newLine = newLine.replace(pos, (size_t)4, "");
00125         }
00126 
00127         m_dxTotalCount++;
00128 
00129         pos = line.find("ffline");
00130         if(pos != string::npos)
00131         {
00132             m_dxOfflineCount++;
00133         }
00134 
00135         pos = line.find("No Activities");
00136         if(pos != string::npos)
00137         {
00138             m_dxIdleCount++;
00139         }
00140 
00141         pos = line.find("Base Accum");
00142         if(pos != string::npos)
00143         {
00144             m_dxBaseAccumCount++;
00145         }
00146 
00147         pos = line.find("Data Coll");
00148         if(pos != string::npos)
00149         {
00150             m_dxDataCollCount++;
00151         }
00152 
00153         pos = line.find("Sig Det");
00154         if(pos != string::npos)
00155         {
00156             m_dxSigDetCount++;
00157         }
00158 
00159         //Attempt to read the activity number, if there is one
00160         //dx1001 (beam1) 2010-08-07 00:19:34 UTC  Act 2735: Init  Sky: 8424.914 MHz Chan: 13
00161         pos = newLine.find("Act ");
00162         if(pos != string::npos)
00163         {
00164             size_t pos2 = newLine.find(": ");
00165             if(pos2 != string::npos)
00166                 m_activity = newLine.substr(pos + 4, (pos2-pos-4)); 
00167         }
00168 
00169         //Determine the min and max freq
00170         int channel = -1;
00171         pos = newLine.find("Chan:");
00172         if(pos != string::npos) channel = Utils::stof(newLine.substr(pos+5));
00173         if(channel > 0)
00174         {
00175             pos = newLine.find("Sky:");
00176             if(pos != string::npos)
00177             {
00178                 size_t pos2 = newLine.find("MHz");
00179                 if(pos2 != string::npos)
00180                 {
00181                     float freq = Utils::stof(newLine.substr((pos+4), (pos2-pos-4)));
00182                     if(freq < m_minDxFreqMHz) m_minDxFreqMHz = freq;
00183                     if(freq > m_maxDxFreqMHz) m_maxDxFreqMHz = freq;
00184                 }
00185             }
00186         }
00187 
00188         add((newLine));
00189     }
00190     else if(Utils::startsWith("arch", line))
00191     {
00192         add((line));
00193     }
00194     else if(Utils::startsWith("tscope", line))
00195     {
00196         add(line);
00197     }
00198     else if(Utils::startsWith("beam", line))
00199     {
00200         add(line);
00201     }
00202     else if(Utils::startsWith("array", line))
00203     {
00204         add(line);
00205     }
00206     else if(Utils::startsWith("primary", line))
00207     {
00208         add(line);
00209     }
00210     else if(Utils::startsWith("NSS", line))
00211     {
00212         this->clear();
00213         size_t pos = line.find("UTC");
00214         if((int)pos >= 9 && pos != string::npos)
00215             m_time = line.substr(pos - 9, 12); 
00216         if((int)pos >= 20 && pos != string::npos)
00217             m_date = line.substr(pos - 20, 10); 
00218 
00219         m_chanTotalCount = 0;
00220         m_chanRunningCount = 0;
00221         m_dxOfflineCount = 0;
00222         m_dxIdleCount = 0;
00223         m_dxBaseAccumCount = 0;
00224         m_dxDataCollCount = 0;
00225         m_dxSigDetCount = 0;
00226         m_dxTotalCount = 0;
00227         m_minDxFreqMHz = 9999999.0;
00228         m_maxDxFreqMHz = -1;
00229 
00230     }
00231     else if(Utils::startsWith("=========", line))
00232     {
00233         m_lastReportedCols  = -1;
00234         m_lastReportedRows  = -1;
00235 
00236         if(m_fullPageIndex == 0) m_fullPageIndex = 1;
00237         else m_fullPageIndex = 0;
00238 
00239         //Compose the channelizer summary string
00240         m_channelizerSummary = "Total Channelizers=" + Utils::itos(m_chanTotalCount);
00241         if(m_chanRunningCount> 0) m_channelizerSummary += 
00242             ", Running=" + Utils::itos(m_chanRunningCount);
00243 
00244         //Dx Summary
00245         m_dxSummary = "Total Dxs=" + Utils::itos(m_dxTotalCount);
00246         if(m_dxOfflineCount > 0) m_dxSummary += ", Offline=" + Utils::itos(m_dxOfflineCount);
00247         if(m_dxIdleCount>0) m_dxSummary += ", Idle=" + Utils::itos(m_dxIdleCount);
00248         if(m_dxBaseAccumCount > 0) m_dxSummary += ", Base Accum=" + Utils::itos(m_dxBaseAccumCount);
00249         if(m_dxDataCollCount > 0) m_dxSummary += ", Data Coll=" + Utils::itos(m_dxDataCollCount);
00250         if(m_dxSigDetCount > 0) m_dxSummary += ", Sig Det=" + Utils::itos(m_dxSigDetCount);
00251 
00252         m_detailsCount = Details::size();
00253 
00254         usleep(10000);
00255         return true;
00256 
00257     }
00258 
00259     return false;
00260 
00261 }
00262 
00263 /*
00264  * Display the information on the screen.
00265  *
00266  * @param pageNum the page number to display.
00267  * @param pageCols the number of columns on the screen.
00268  * @param pageRows the number of rows on the screen.
00269  * @return true if screen has changed, else false.
00270  */
00271 bool Components::paint(int pageNum, int pageCols, int pageRows)
00272 {
00273 
00274     bool hasChanged = false;
00275     char tempLine[65];
00276 
00277     //If the page or size has changed, clear the buffer.
00278     if(pageNum != m_lastRequestedPage || pageRows != m_lastReportedRows)
00279     {
00280         m_screenBuffer.clear();  
00281         m_lastRequestedPage = pageNum;
00282         m_lastReportedRows = pageRows;
00283     }
00284 
00285     //Note: 3 lines at the top: time and title, activity, blank
00286     //Note: 3 lines at the bottom: blank, cahnnelizer summary, dx summary
00287     int realRows = pageRows -3 -3;
00288     if(pageNum > getNumPages(pageRows)) pageNum = getNumPages(pageRows);
00289     int vectorStartIndex = (pageNum-1) * realRows ;
00290     string line;
00291 
00292     //Define a blank line
00293     string blank(pageCols, ' ');
00294 
00295     //Draw the header
00296     string headerString = "SonATA System Status";
00297     move(0,0);
00298     addstr(blank.c_str());
00299     move(0,0);
00300     line = m_time;
00301     addstr(line.c_str());
00302     Utils::drawColorText(0, pageCols/2 - line.size()/2, 3, headerString);
00303 
00304     //Draw the activity number
00305     move(1,0);
00306     line = "Activity: " + m_activity;
00307     line.resize(pageCols, ' ');
00308     addstr(line.c_str());
00309 
00310     //The starting row is 3 to get past the header and a blank line
00311     int startRow = 3;
00312 
00313     //Loop through the gathered data displaying the appropriate lines.
00314     for(int i = 0; i<realRows; i++)
00315     {
00316         int vectorIndex = vectorStartIndex + i;
00317 
00318         if(vectorIndex >= Details::size())
00319         {
00320             move(startRow+i, 0);
00321             addstr(blank.c_str());
00322         }
00323         else
00324         {
00325             std::pair<string, string> keyval = Details::get(vectorIndex);
00326             line = (string)keyval.first;
00327             line.resize(9, ' ');
00328             line += (string)keyval.second;
00329             line.resize(pageCols, ' ');
00330 
00331             //If not defined yet, add to vector
00332             if(i >= (int)m_screenBuffer.size())
00333             {
00334                 m_screenBuffer.push_back(line);
00335                 move(startRow+i, 0);
00336                 addstr(line.c_str());
00337                 hasChanged = true;
00338             }
00339             else if(m_screenBuffer[i].compare(line)) //If line changed, redraw.
00340             {
00341                 m_screenBuffer[i] = line;
00342                 move(startRow+i, 0);
00343                 addstr(line.c_str());
00344                 hasChanged = true;
00345             }
00346 
00347             //Highlight the second column with state color coding.
00348             if(line.find("Offline") != string::npos)
00349                 Utils::drawSquare(startRow+i, 7, 8);
00350             else if(line.find("Run") != string::npos)
00351                 Utils::drawSquare(startRow+i, 7, 10);
00352             else
00353                 Utils::drawSquare(startRow+i, 7, 9);
00354 
00355 
00356         }
00357     }
00358 
00359     //Draw the channelizer summary
00360     m_channelizerSummary.resize(pageCols, ' ');
00361     Utils::drawColorText(pageRows-2, 0, 2, m_channelizerSummary);
00362 
00363     //Draw the Dx summary
00364     m_dxSummary.resize(pageCols, ' ');
00365     Utils::drawColorText(pageRows-1, 0, 2, m_dxSummary);
00366 
00367     //Draw the frequency range if currently collecting data.
00368     if(m_lastFreqRangeStringLen > 0)
00369         Utils::drawColorText(pageRows-1, 
00370                 pageCols-m_lastFreqRangeStringLen-1, 2, blank);
00371     if(m_maxDxFreqMHz > 50.0 && m_minDxFreqMHz > -1)
00372     {
00373         sprintf(tempLine, "%.04f to %.04f MHz", m_minDxFreqMHz, m_maxDxFreqMHz);
00374         Utils::drawColorText(pageRows-1, pageCols-strlen(tempLine)-1, 2, tempLine);
00375         m_lastFreqRangeStringLen = (int)strlen(tempLine);
00376     }
00377 
00378     //Park the cursor in the lower right corner
00379     move(pageRows-1, pageCols-1);
00380 
00381     return hasChanged;
00382 
00383 }
00384 
00385 /*
00386  * Get the number of pages required to display all the information.
00387  *
00388  * @param pageRows the number of rows available on the screen.
00389  * @return the number of pages required to display all the
00390  * information.
00391  */
00392 int Components::getNumPages(int pageRows)
00393 {
00394     //Note: 3 lines at the top: time and title, activity, blank
00395     //Note: 3 lines at the bottom: blank, cahnnelizer summary, dx summary
00396     int realRows = pageRows -3 -3;
00397 
00398     return (int)(m_detailsCount/realRows) + 1;
00399 }

00402  * Get the type of this object inherited from the Details class.
00403  *
00404  * @return the type as a detail_t enum value.
00405  */
00406 int Components::getType()
00407 {
00408     return m_thisType;
00409 }
00410 
00411 /*
00412  * Get the current page number displayed.
00413  *
00414  * @return the current page number displayed.
00415  */
00416 int Components::getCurrentPageNumber()
00417 {
00418     if(m_lastRequestedPage <= 0) return 1;
00419     return m_lastRequestedPage;
00420 }
